Name: problemID
Description:
problem id
Note on the backward compatibility: it is also allowed to use "the code of the problem" as the value of the problemId parameter

Name: tests
Description: comma separated list of test case numbers to be executed against submission

Name: files
Description: set of files that form a project to be executed (see also: multi-file mode)

Name: candidate_name
Description: Name of the Candidate; Unique User ID (uuid)
